definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] swerver, revolter (?), deeds that swerve (fr. the right?);—pl. [[וְשַׁחֲטָה]] [[שֵׂטִים הֶעֱמִיקוּ]] Ho 5:2 and revolters have gone deep is slaughter (or [[שַׁחֲתָה]] in corruption), but dub.; We Bae Now GASm, cf. Gu:Kau, ´[[וְשַׁחַת הַשִּׁטִּים הֶע]]: and the pit of Shiṭṭim they have made deep; [[עֲשׂה סֵטִים]] Ps 101:3 to do deeds that swerve I hate.
